description: This is a shivers orb showing the former tenant.

dialogueTree.title: Shivers: "A shift in temperature. The air chi..."
dialogueTree.text: A shift in temperature. The air chills around you. Dust settles on the stony floor.

links.title: Shivers: "A former architect stands before a..."
links.text: A former architect stands before a slice of window, a room plan in her hand. A cold wave has made the air in the building stand still and frozen, with temperatures falling down to -20Â°C.

links.title: Shivers: "...is red from the cold. She's brea..."
links.text: ...is red from the cold. She's breathing on her fingers clasping the plan. Traces of sadness are visible in her expression.

links.title: Shivers: "... faint pencil lines on paper dep..."
links.text: ... faint pencil lines on paper depict the same place, but a missing eastern wall connects the room with the neighbouring apartment. Ideas for arranging the furniture have been jotted down.

links.title: Shivers: "It's clean and empty, with new tape..."
links.text: It's clean and empty, with new tapestry embellishing the walls. A standard HB graphite pencil has fallen off a three-legged stool in the middle of the room.

links.title: Conceptualization: "She had an eye for beauty."
links.text: She had an eye for beauty.
